an10.175:4.1: “Mendicants, this teaching provides a bypass, it doesn’t lack a bypass.
an10.175:4.2: And how does this teaching provide a bypass, not lacking a bypass?
an10.175:4.3: Not killing living creatures bypasses killing living creatures.
an10.175:4.5: Avoiding sexual misconduct bypasses sexual misconduct.
an10.175:4.7: Avoiding divisive speech bypasses divisive speech.
an10.175:4.8: Avoiding harsh speech bypasses harsh speech.
an10.175:4.9: Avoiding meaningless speech bypasses meaningless speech.
an10.175:4.13: That’s how this teaching provides a bypass, it doesn’t lack a bypass.”
